Subject: This is an invitation!

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

This is an invitation to join us in the ultimate mailing list about the movie 
Gladiator, by Ridley Scott. We can talk about anything in here, as long as 
it's related to that topic, which means we can talk about the screenplay, the 
cast and crew, the music, the real history of gladiators, the plot details, 
the video and dvd releases, anything! We can also trade pictures of the movie 
and the stars, so we can have the largest collection of pictures from the 
film available on the internet. Join us in the Colosseum!
If you liked the movie, you won't regret it.
Sincerely yours,
Rafe McCawley, Moderator.

--part1_c.6cddc4d.26821ba6_boundary
Content-Type: image/jpeg; name="invitation gladiator.jpg"
Content-Disposition: inline; filename="invitation gladiator.jpg"

--part1_c.6cddc4d.26821ba6_boundary--
